text: "Familiar Pain" is a song recorded by American country music group Restless Heart. It was released in February 1992 as the second single from their compilation album The Best of Restless Heart. The song reached #40 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. The song was written by Walt Aldridge and Susan Longacre. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1992) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|40 |} ==References== Category:1992 singles Category:1991 songs Category:Restless Heart songs Category:Songs written by Walt Aldridge Category:Songs written by Susan Longacre Category:Song recordings produced by Josh Leo Category:RCA Records singles
title: Familiar Pain
